name: CONTACT_INFO_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure of the 'ContactInfoList' node, which contains multiple 'ContactInfo' elements. Each 'ContactInfo' includes a unique 'ContactInfoID', a 'ContactTypeText' indicating the type of contact, an optional 'IndividualRef' linking to an individual, and nested 'Phone' and 'EmailAddress' nodes for contact details.
prompt: Verify that each <ContactInfo> in <ContactInfoList> has a unique <ContactInfoID>, a valid <ContactTypeText>, and optionally an <IndividualRef>. Ensure that <Phone> and <EmailAddress> nodes are present and correctly structured.
